message: Bob, I'm confident this product will be highly valuable to you, considering its potential worth. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. This price reflects its high quality and the benefits it can bring to your operations.  I'm open to discussing a fair price, but I'm confident this is a great starting point.

I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I'm not sure I can meet your price of $1000000. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me is no more than $1200000.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $950000, acknowledging the value you see in this product. Let's find a solution that works for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $950000, but I'm still a bit far from that. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $925000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
